snippet: The Syrian government freed a group of detainees that included women and children in exchange for the nuns’ release by insurgents.
abstract: Video of unusual prisoner swap between the Syrian government and insurgents appears to confirm the government has been holding women and children prisoner, including relatives of suspected opposition fighters; prisoners were swapped with Syrian nuns the opposition fighters had held for more than three months.

byline.contributor: Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The Syrian government freed a group of detainees that included women and children in exchange for the nuns’ release by insurgents.

headline.main: Release of Syrian Nuns Was Part of a Hostage Swap
headline.print_headline: Release of Syrian Nuns Was Part of a Hostage Swap

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
